main.name: Bingling Dong
main.description: Studying Computer Science at Stony Brook University
main.bio: A college senior seeking a summer internship to gain experiences in all areas pursuing a Bachelor’s and a Master’s degree in Computer Science. An optimistic, organized, and hard-working young adult that is capable of adapting new concepts quickly.

projects.title: Sahara
projects.category: A team project to develop both the frontend and the backend of an E-commerce website that sells items online. Database schema designed in BCNF form.

projects.category: An application that can generate a course website for a course based on user inputs. Transaction Process System (undo/redo). Files saved/uploaded in JSON formats.
